text: ( Source : PCHA - Palestinian Centre for Human Rights ) Ref: 64/ 2015 Using excessive lethal force in the Gaza Strip , Israeli forces killed in less than 24 hours 4 Palestinian civilians: a pregnant woman and her child in an airstrike on their
